year i am so excited to knock this crafting project off my bucket list and i hope you love the wreath tree skirt free crochet pattern too i have also created a video tutorial to guide you through the steps https //youtu be/xk2ijsodfko 1 **crochet hook ** size us p 10 mm crochet hook 2 **notions ** yarn needle scissors **yarn ** lion brand wool ease quick and thick 3 super bulky weight yarn 80% acrylic 20% wool **yardage ** large 830 yds 759m 8 balls medium 460 yds 421m 5 balls small 100 yds 92m 1 ball **abbreviations/stitches ** blo -back loop only chain -chain flo -front loop only half_double_crochet -half_double_crochet increase - increase lp s -loop s st s -stitch es **gauge** 7 5 sts by 4 8 row = 4 square in established stitch pattern **measurements/sizes ** large diameter 47 119cm medium diameter 37 94cm small diameter 17 43cm schematic in pattern **skill level ** easy/advanced beginner the pattern on the blog the free version of this pattern supported by
